column1: Master of Science in Finance (FinTech and Financial Analytics)
column5: With the rise of disruptive technologies and the new generation of Big Data and FinTech, concepts of money, payments, identity, and security need to be looked at through a new lens -- how can finance professionals respond early and effectively to ride the wave, and take advantage of the new opportunities before it’s too late?
column7: HKD$ 280,000 (subject to University's approval) Note: Tuition fees are subject to annual review.
